鬺字的基本解释

鬺
shāng
烹煮牲肉以祭祀：“禹收九牧之金，铸九鼎，皆尝亨（烹）鬺上帝鬼神。”

鬺字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāng］
［《集韻》尸羊切，平陽，書。］
烹煮。

鬺字的康熙字典解释

【亥集上】【鬲字部】　鬺； 康熙笔画：21； 页码：页1459第40
【集韻】【韻會】式羊切【正韻】尸羊切，?音商。與?同。【博雅】鬺，飪也。【史記·封禪書】皆嘗烹鬺上帝鬼神。【註】徐廣曰：鬺，烹煑也。【前漢·郊祀志註】師古曰：鬺，烹煑而祀也。韓詩引采蘋曰：于以鬺之，唯錡及釜。

鬺字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鬺字的起名意思

暂无。

鬺
Basic explanation of words
鬺
shāng
Cooking animal meat for sacrifice: "Yu collects the gold of the nine animal husbandry and casts Jiuding, and all tastes Heng (cooking) the gods, ghosts and gods."
鬺
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shāng］
["Jiyun" corpse sheep cut, Pingyang, book. ]
Cooking.
鬺
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Haiji 1】【Fuji Department】　鬺; Kangxi Strokes: 21; Page Number: Page 1459 No. 40
[Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Style Sheep Cut [Zheng Yun] Corpse Sheep Cut, Sound Quotient. Same as? 【Bo Ya】Nose, cook too. 【Historical Records·Feng Zen Book】Everyone tastes cooking, gods, ghosts and gods. [Note] Xu Guang said: 鬺, cooking and cooking. [Annotation to the History of Jiao Si Zhi in the Former Han Dynasty] Shi Gu said: 鬺, cook and worship. Han Shi cited Caiping and said: Yu Yiyuezhi, only Qi and the cauldron.
